name: my-bhvr-app
author: Steve Simkins
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, and React

scripts.dev: bun run build:shared && concurrently "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.dev:server: cd server && dotenv -e ../.env -- bun run --hot src/index.ts
scripts.dev:client: cd client && dotenv -e ../.env -- bun run dev
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:client
scripts.build:client: cd client && dotenv -e ../.env -- bun run build
